column4: i'm excited - my first ubuntu server install, first nameserver, first mailserver... everything seems to be working so far...
of course it does, its real software :-)
i've been around unix/xenix/linux for alot of years as a developer/tuner/db consultant... now since i own my own companies, i wanted to have my own server...
kingspawn  is right - #ubuntu-offtopic this place is busy enough
